item.description:
Memorial Day Parade, Monday May 30th, Morning time (9 a.m. for decorating the float)
Decorate Gordon's truck and tow trailer with good ol' red white and blue.

Promoting Wapping Fair with our 2010 Wapping Farmer winner -

possible cow mascot?!?!!? wha?!?!? that's right. any volunteers?

We walk the 1.5 mile route handing out candy to the masses.

Some can ride in the trailer and wave to the masses..

Come out and help us decorate the best float in town!

Rebecca will be chairing this event.
item.how_to_find_us: We meet on Connecticut Ave (off South Satellite Rd). Park in any business lots on either road
item.name: Memorial Day Parade
